pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Aerobiological Data // Supports analysis of aerobiological data. Available features include determination of pollen season limits, replacement of outliers (Kasprzyk and Walanus (2014) doi:10.1007/s10453-014-9332-8), calculation of growing degree days (Baskerville and Emin (1969) doi:10.2307/1933912), and determination of the base temperature for growing degree days (Yang et al. (1995) doi:10.1016/0168-1923(94)02185-M).
